<noinclude>
Add a new set of Absorption-Emission Spectroscopy experiments (a table in which each row describes one investigation):
{{#forminput:form=Absorption Emission Spectroscopy experiments}}
</noinclude>

<includeonly>
{{{for template|Absorption Emission Spectroscopy experiments}}}
experiments:
{{{field|experiments|holds template}}}
{{{end template}}}

{{{for template|Absorption Emission Spectroscopy|multiple|embed in field=Absorption Emission Spectroscopy experiments[experiments]}}}
{| class="formtable"
! Molecule / :
| {{{field|molecule|input type=combobox|property=Molecule|values from url=molecule_lookup}}}
|-
! experimental / calculated:
| {{{field|experiment_type|input type=dropdown|property=Experiment Type}}}
|-
! Absorption maximum given [nm]:
| {{{field|absorption_max|input type=regexp|property=Absorption Max|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(V)?)?$/}}}
|-
! Absorption intensity max [??]:
| {{{field|absorption_intensity_max|input type=regexp|property=Absorption Intensity Max|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(ml|l)?)?$/}}}
|-
! Emission maximum given [nm]
| {{{field|emission_max|input type=regexp|property=Emission Max|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(M|mM|µM)?)?$/}}}
|-
! Emission intensity maximum [??]
| {{{field|emission_intensity_max|property=Emission Intensity Max|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(M|mM|µM)?)?$/}}}
|-
! solvent / solvent concentration [µM]:
| {{{field|solvent|input type=combobox|property=Solvent|values from url=molecule_lookup_solvent}}}
| {{{field|solvent_conc|input type=regexp|property=Solvent concentration|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(M|mM|µM)?)?$/}}}
|-
! temperature [°C]:
| {{{field|temp|input type=regexp|property=Temperature|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(°C)?)?$/}}}
|-
! absorption coefficient:
| {{{field|absorption_coefficient|input type=regexp|property=Absorption Coefficient|base type=Number|message=Input a positive number|regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*(\s+(V)?)?$/}}}
|-
! include:
| {{{field|include|input type=checkbox|property=Include}}} (check it when you want to include this investigation on topic pages)
|}
;Details:
{{{field|details|input type=textarea|property=Details|message=Arbitrary extra information}}}
{{{end template}}}
